Model.Description: The specific model of the vehicle.

Year.Description: The year the vehicle was manufactured.

Engine_Size.Description: The size of the vehicle's engine in liters.

Fuel_Type.Description: The type of fuel the vehicle uses.

Transmission.Description: The type of transmission the vehicle has.

Mileage.Description: The total distance the vehicle has been driven in kilometers.

Doors.Description: The number of doors the vehicle has.

Owner_Count.Description: The number of previous owners the vehicle has had.

Price.Description: The current price of the vehicle in dollars.
